channel.id: Crime and Investigation Network HDTV (CI HD)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Winter Sun
programme.desc: Tracey and Gareth Sadd love the northern part of Tenerife and are keen to find a bolt-hole that they can escape to regularly. Presenter Jasmine Harman searches the local market to find properties to match the couple's £110,000 budget in the hope that they'll like one of them enough to make an offer.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Winter Sun
programme.desc: Liverpool couple John and Pauline McDonough both have demanding jobs in the pharmaceutical industry and want to find a relaxing bolt-hole to escape to in Spain's Granada province. Laura Hamilton shows them five properties starting at just under £86,000 in the hope that they will make an offer.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Winter Sun
programme.desc: Jasmine Harman helps married couple Ali and Ben Brown from Kent find their ideal property abroad, as she shows them five places on the Spanish island of Gran Canaria.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Winter Sun
programme.desc: London-based couple Rena Sodhi and Donna Carty want a second home they can escape to in Mojacar, southern Spain. Laura Hamilton finds a townhouse with stunning views for £25,000 less than their budget, but the buyers spot something even more tempting in the presenter's line up of possible purchases.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Winter Sun
programme.desc: Jasmine Harman helps couple Jane and David Turnbull, who have a budget of £80,000, to search for a house in Lanzarote. The property must have a lot of potential, and the pressure is on as it will eventually become their retirement home.(n)

programme.title: Great Canal Journeys
programme.desc: Part two of two. Timothy West and Prunella Scales leave India's canals behind to explore the Brahmaputra river, a rarely navigated stretch of water with a remarkable history. They follow an old tea trading route, meet a community of monks and take a ride on an elephant.(n)

programme.title: Grand Designs
programme.desc: Boat enthusiast James Strangeways invites Kevin McCloud to survey progress on the construction of his new home, which his architect nephew Ben Hebblethwaite has designed to be as `un-houselike' as possible. James has spent the past 35 years travelling the canals and waterways of Britain, and despite never liking houses, has decided now is the time to put down roots on dry land. Ben hoped a home standing on stilts above a marsh, and incorporating ship-like qualities such as a keel-shaped roof, will be enough to satisfy his boat-mad uncle. However, Ben's contractor goes into liquidation a few months into the project, taking £87,000 of the £300,000 budget, and when James decides to make a few tweaks to the design, alarm-bells begin to ring for the young architect.(n)

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: The fiery chef comes to the aid of a French restaurant in the heart of Moorpark, California. The pompous, over-complicated cuisine is keeping the customers away and there is an imminent threat of bankruptcy. However, the owner is vigorously opposed to change, despite the failings of his current business model.(n)

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Chef Gordon Ramsay heads to the Park's Edge restaurant in Atlanta, Georgia, where a series of spats with the local community are hampering its success. Owners Richard and Jorge's in-fighting has alienated locals, and the duo's suggestion that customer numbers are low because of racism has heightened tensions.(n)

programme.title: Ramsay's Hotel Hell
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay checks in at the 90-year-old Monticello Hotel in Longview, Washington, where owner Phillip Lovingfoss has an apparent liking for alcohol that some of his staff claim is threatening to destroy the business. The challenge of turning around the hotel's fortunes only increases when the chef sees shocking allegations about Phillip splashed all over the front page of the local newspaper.(n)

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: The chef comes to the aid of Lela's, a California restaurant that is currently being run into the ground by its inexperienced owner. Gordon tries to turn the failing business around, but faces opposition from the chef and makes enemies when he exposes the suspect behaviour of some members of staff.(n)

programme.title: Ackley Bridge
programme.desc: Missy suffers a traumatic discovery regarding Nana Booth, and fearing that social services will take Haley into care, she keeps everything a secret until she forced to ask Emma for help with money. Meanwhile, Nas is left feeling heartbroken when her relationship with Lila starts to hit rocky ground, and Kaneez realises she has to alert Mandy about the Booth girls when she gets caught in a fight between Simone and Missy. School drama series, starring Jo Joyner, Paul Nicholls and Sunetra Sarker.(n)

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: An 18-year-old is rushed in after breaking his leg while playing football, and doctors worry it may have long-term implications. Meanwhile, David, who is 29, is airlifted to St George's following a head-on collision at speed, and 94-year-old Mary arrives after falling backwards down 14 steps and losing consciousness.(n)

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: Doctors treat a young woman who has been thrown from a horse, which then trampled on her, and also a woman who was hit by a car while riding her motorbike on a dual carriageway. Plus, an 11-year-old boy is brought into hospital after running into a wall at school and hurting his wrist.(n)

programme.title: One Born Every Minute
programme.desc: Exploring life at Liverpool Women's Hospital through the eyes of male midwife Chris, a former navy trauma medic. Cameras also follow 22-year-old Kiefer, the birthing partner for his girlfriend Sophie. Following life-threatening complications during the birth of their first child, can he hold it together this time?.(n)

programme.title: 24 Hours in Police Custody
programme.desc: This edition follows the case of a man who was attacked and left unconscious on the floor of a crowded pub for more than 30 minutes, but no-one is prepared to come forward and name the assailant. The next day, detectives from Bedfordshire Police seize CCTV footage from the pub and though they can clearly see the vicious assault, they are unable to easily identify who threw the punches. Cameras follow every twist and turn of the investigation as the officers try to overcome the wall of silence they face.(n)

programme.title: Bodyshockers
programme.desc: Katie Piper meets a woman with a surgery-free solution to enlarging her assets - inflatable N-cup breasts. The programme also features Glen, who has vowed to transform his wife's body from white to black, and a woman who regrets an eyebrow raise that has left her seeing double. Plus, Julian cannot work out why he had such protruding pec implants, and a child minder wants to defy her mum with large tattoos on the backs of her legs.(n)

programme.title: The Crystal Maze
programme.desc: Richard Ayoade guides another team of five well-known faces on an epic adventure through four fantastical zones - Aztec, Medieval, Industrial and Futuristic. In each zone the team must tackle physical, skill, mystery and mental challenges in a bid to win crystals. These elusive crystals each give them five seconds inside the iconic Crystal Dome, where they hope to collect gold tokens to convert into prizes. This instalment sees adventurers Steve Jones, Scarlett Moffatt, David Coulthard, Joey Essex and team captain Jodie Kidd hope to conquer the maze, in support of the charity Stand Up to Cancer.(n)

programme.title: The Secret Life of
programme.sub-title: The Secret Life of Brothers and Sisters.
programme.desc: Part one of two. Documentary exploring sibling relationships in the first experiment of its kind in the UK. Filmed during a family camping holiday in the woods, the programme follows a group of children as they take part in tasks including a hay bale race, family drawings, and building exercises. Scientists observe their every move in a bid to learn about the dynamics between brothers and sisters, including how they interact and encourage each other, how they cope with younger siblings, and how they support each other in times of need.(n)

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay is in New Jersey to help Rose Leone, who spent two years in a coma and came out of hospital to learn her son Michael had run her once-thriving Italian restaurant into the ground. With a menu of more than 126 dishes, the quality of the food is suffering, and even the chefs refuse to eat their own creations.(n)

programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Stable-owner Alice and her boyfriend Ollie, travel specialists Gareth and Hihine, and newlyweds John and Katy compete over three evenings in Cambridge to host the best dinner party.(n)

programme.title: Posh Pawnbrokers
programme.desc: At Pickwick Pawnbrokers in London, Nathan and his sidekick Debbs seal the deals on an unusual life-size Majolica lion, a rare book, and racing silks owned by jockey AP McCoy. Meanwhile, at Dan's London Road Shop in Sheffield, the team values a selection of high-end rubies and an unusual astronaut jukebox.(n)

programme.title: Posh Pawnbrokers
programme.desc: Dan Hatfield and his team try to do a deal on a tank, and one customer wants £10,000 for his gold. Meanwhile, Nathan Finch is bewitched by some valuable paintings.(n)

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: The househunters are in Norfolk, where Phil Spencer helps young-at-heart pensioners John and Peggy, who are relocating from Derby to fulfil their dream of living by the sea. With £450,000 to spend, there's an exacting list of criteria that must be met. Meanwhile, Kirstie Allsopp assists Yvonne and Lisa, who have reached the end of their tether after spending more than a year searching for a home in a rural district.(n)

programme.title: Best of Both Worlds
programme.desc: Lucy Alexander helps a man searching for a home in the Cotswolds that will help him recover from a serious stroke, while also giving him easy access to the countryside and London.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The competition starts at the Poacher Inn in South Warnborough, Hampshire, where landlady Nadia Schicchi hopes her Italian directness and business approach will win the day.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Barber Kenny Flynn hosts the first dinner party in Liverpool. His evening has a `big kids' theme, so he prepares burger buns striped like a zebra and baby octopuses that resemble spiders. His guests are Nigerian model Cynthia Umezulike, rock music enthusiast Glen Simpson, businessman Rob Spicer and fine-dining enthusiast Jilly Pollock.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Multiple business owner Rob Spicer welcomes the diners to his home for the second party in Liverpool. He is convinced his `historical leader' theme will be a hit, but there is a shock in store as one of the guests reveals a secret about herself.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Model and barrister Cynthia Umezulike hosts the third dinner party in Liverpool, and hopes her meal including tribal fish, a traditional Nigerian jeloff and an exotic fruit platter will impress her guests.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Rock music enthusiast Glen Simpson hosts the fourth dinner party in Liverpool. He rustles up sticky blackened pork and an Elvis-inspired dessert of deep fat-fried chocolate bars with home-made peanut butter and banana ice-cream, but grievances among the guests threaten to derail the evening's entertainment.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Jilly Pollock hosts the fifth and final party in Liverpool, inviting her fellow contestants to a black-tie event. She prepares a selection of self-styled dishes for her diners, including figs, hot beef and berry delight, and hopes an evening of ballroom dancing will ease tensions following the previous night's arguments.(n)

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: First of a two-part special in which Gordon Ramsay heads to the Burger Kitchen in Los Angeles, where tensions are running high because owner Alan Saffron has spent his son's entire inheritance on the struggling restaurant. To make matters worse, the kitchen is run by a chef called David Blaine who shares nothing of his famous namesake's magic when it comes to cooking - and whose threatening behaviour regularly gets him into trouble.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Randy DeWitt, the CEO and co-founder of bar and grill chain Twin Peaks, goes undercover to find out whether the company's culture is keeping up with its rapid growth. Posing as a contestant on a reality TV competition, he works among his own staff.(n)

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: Phil Spencer catches up with Mel and Jon, who had their hearts set on owning a piece of the Herefordshire countryside, while Kirstie Allsopp revisits outdoor sports enthusiasts Liz and John, a year after helping them find a property to suit their needs in Derby.(n)

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: In Liverpool, Kirstie Allsopp catches up with student Kate Harland, who was desperate to swap her noisy flat for something more grown up. She also revisits Kelly Price and Emma Wilcox on the Berkshire and Hampshire borders, whose house-hunting had been the cause of a few tears.(n)

programme.title: The Crystal Maze
programme.desc: Richard Ayoade guides another team of five well-known faces on an epic adventure through four fantastical zones - Aztec, Medieval, Industrial and Futuristic. In each zone the team must tackle physical, skill, mystery and mental challenges in a bid to win crystals. These elusive crystals each give them five seconds inside the iconic Crystal Dome, where they hope to collect gold tokens to convert into prizes. This instalment sees adventurers Steve Jones, Scarlett Moffatt, David Coulthard, Joey Essex and team captain Jodie Kidd hope to conquer the maze, in support of the charity Stand Up to Cancer.(n)

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: `Deadly' (aka David) found fame with his UK garage crew, and though he may be confident on stage, he's shy and retiring with the ladies. Can he bring his A-game when he meet teaching assistant Helen? Other diners include rock fan Anthony, who meets retired nurse and fellow northerner Barbara. She's an amateur magician with a few dating tricks up her sleeve.(n)

programme.title: 8 Out of 10 Cats Does Countdown
programme.desc: Jimmy Carr hosts the words-and-numbers game, with Jon Richardson and Jonathan Ross taking on guest captain Lee Mack and Victoria Coren Mitchell. Jessie Cave joins Susie Dent in Dictionary Corner and Rachel Riley looks after the numbers and letters.(n)

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance to buy goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: Dance Moms
programme.desc: Abby gives Brynn and JoJo hip-hop solos, but hands Mackenzie a safe acrobatic routine. Mackenzie fights for what she wants, as Abby flees the studio. American reality series about the world of competitive dance.(n)

programme.title: Beverly Hills Ninja
programme.desc: A baby survives a shipwreck and is raised by a clan of ninjas, growing up to become clumsy and overweight, and does not fit in with the other warriors despite his best efforts. When a woman seeks their help, he seizes the chance to prove himself, travelling to America and battling an international counterfeiting operation. Slapstick comedy, starring Chris Farley, Nicolette Sheridan and Chris Rock.(n)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: Jay tries to get in shape for a marathon but Michael thinks he can do it without training. Meanwhile, Tony asks Claire to dress down in an effort to lessen her allure. American comedy, starring Damon Wayans.(n)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: Vanessa has her first ultrasound scan, and Michael becomes obsessed with finding out whether he is going to have a grandson or a granddaughter. American comedy, starring Damon Wayans.(n)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: Claire throws a party while Michael and Jay are out - but someone spikes the punch, prompting a drunken Tony to fulfil a lifelong fantasy and streak down the street. American sitcom starring Damon Wayans.(n)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: Michael agrees to sit in on keyboards with old friend and former bandmaster Johnny `Saxophone' Watson, only to find his musical skills have started to get a little rusty through disuse. American sitcom, starring Damon Wayans.(n)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.sub-title: The Lady Is Not a Tramp.
programme.desc: Michael is aghast to find condoms in Claire's rucksack, and immediately jumps to the wrong conclusion. Damon Wayans stars.(n)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: Jay suspects there is a mouse in the house when she finds droppings and demands that Michael hire an exterminator.(n)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: Junior grows tired of living in the garage and decides to look for a place of his own, helped by John - who is forced to dress up and pose as his grandmother in a desperate bid to fool a pushy estate agent.(n)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: Michael agrees to help Kady sell chocolate to raise money for her school. However, he takes the challenge too seriously and spoils her fun by clashing with the father of another child.(n)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: Junior finally restores his beloved car, a gas-guzzling 1964 Impala - then surprises everyone by selling it so that he and Vanessa will have more money to lavish on their new baby. American sitcom, starring Damon Wayans.(n)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: Michael and Jay prepare to celebrate their anniversary, but are both forced to conceal their disappointment when they do not receive the gifts they were expecting. American sitcom, starring Damon Wayans.(n)

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: Daily round-up of highlights, revealing how the housemates are getting on under the all-seeing eye of Big Brother, featuring the latest tasks, games, arguments, laughs, diary room visits and bedroom chit-chat. Narrated by Marcus Bentley.(n)

programme.title: Can't Pay? We'll Take It Away
programme.desc: Documentary giving an insight into cash-strapped Britain from the perspectives of debtors, creditors and those who collect the payments, including High Court enforcement bailiffs and repossession teams. The series follows each case as it unfolds, recording the thoughts and feelings on both sides, the process of repossession and the impact it has on all involved.(n)

programme.title: Can't Pay? We'll Take It Away
programme.desc: Agents Stewart and Iain head to Manchester, where a landlord is owed £8,000 in rent arrears and has already called for police back-up. As tempers rise, the pair must find a way to handle a situation that is spiralling dangerously out of control. Meanwhile, Brian and Del chase £3,000 owed to a firm of letting agents, before tracking a debtor who was accidentally over-paid for a job. Plus, Stewart and Iain face an eviction that is set to test their patience.(n)

programme.title: Can't Pay? We'll Take It Away
programme.desc: In this special episode, the High Court enforcement agents have to deal with a fraudulent tenant, an evasive debtor and a mother in denial. Steve and Ben are in west London to see a tenant who owes £14,000 in unpaid rent, but when they gain access to the property they discover the house has divided up like a hotel and is being sublet. In Sussex, Brian and Del chase a debt of over £10,000 owed to a van rental business for damaged vehicles, before heading to Kent to try to reclaim £6,000 of unpaid rent from a woman financially dependent on a new partner after a disastrous divorce.(n)

programme.title: Blind Date
programme.desc: Paul O'Grady seeks a would-be sweetheart for Arnold, who emigrated from Africa to Manchester, and served with the British Army in Afghanistan for nearly five years. Arnold's idea of a perfect date would involve a spin on the London Eye, and Paul gives three ladies a chance to woo the gentlemanly soldier. Meanwhile, finance director Gemma - also from Manchester - seeks an adventurous Prince Charming to settle down and start a family with. Plus, the host catches up with last week's couples, to find out whether that initial spark of attraction could develop into something more.(n)

programme.title: On Benefits
programme.sub-title: On Benefits: UK's Most Hated Woman?.
programme.desc: The documentary about people on benefits meets a whole new group - those who are living quite comfortably on little money. They include Worcester woman Susanne, who gave up work eight months ago due to a heart problem and now claims £1,600 a month. Eager to live the celebrity lifestyle, she drives a £28,000 car and hit the headlines in January after making an unsuccessful claim on a £33million National Lottery ticket. Others featured are Carl from the Isle of Sheppey, who spends most of his time and money at his local pub, and Bradford man Craig, who gave up his job two years ago to be a full-time single dad to his seven-year-old son.(n)

programme.title: On Benefits
programme.desc: Single mum Debra has a number of failed relationships behind her and now wants to buy her own home. When the chance of a part in a movie comes up, she hopes this will be the big break she is hoping for. Maidstone man Anthony thinks his epilepsy is putting off potential employers, Hull carer Anne Marie says she does not receive enough money to take her granddaughter out for day trips, while Steven from Southend spends his benefits helping to feed the homeless.(n)

programme.title: Wentworth Prison
programme.desc: Jake presses Vera to move in with him, Juice gets her comeuppance, Ferguson takes over from Kaz, and Boomer reveals an unsuspected talent.(n)

programme.title: The Frozen Ground
programme.desc: An Alaska state trooper tries to bring a serial killer who has been terrorising the Anchorage area for 13 years to justice. When a woman escapes the maniac's clutches, the lawman seeks her help in identifying him, but finds he will have a hard time earning her trust. Fact-based crime drama, with Nicolas Cage, John Cusack and Vanessa Hudgens.(n)

programme.title: That '70s Show
programme.desc: Pilot episode of the nostalgic American comedy about Eric Forman, a 17-year-old struggling to cope with all that life throws at him. Eric is delighted when his father finally gives him the keys to the family's car. Topher Grace, Mila Kunis and Ashton Kutcher star.(n)

programme.title: That '70s Show
programme.desc: Kitty plans a surprise party for Eric, but struggles to keep it a secret - and then fails to buy him a present he can appreciate. Laurie makes an impression on the guys, and love-struck Donna begins to worry things may be happening too quickly. Nostalgic comedy, starring Mila Kunis and Topher Grace.(n)

programme.title: Fletch Lives
programme.desc: Wisecracking reporter IM Fletcher inherits a crumbling plantation in Louisiana from his aunt, and spends his first night sleeping there with a lawyer - who winds up dead the next morning. Suspecting murder, he uses a succession of disguises and uncovers a conspiracy surrounding the crooked owner of a Christian theme park and the dumping of toxic waste. Comedy sequel, with Chevy Chase, Hal Holbrook and Julianne Phillips.(n)

programme.title: Dirty Dancing
programme.desc: A dance instructor at a 1960s resort hotel fears his career will be jeopardised when his regular partner is forced to pull out of an important show in which they are due to perform. Luckily, a naive teenager is happy to step in, and is treated to a whirlwind holiday education in life, love and expressing herself. Romantic drama, starring Patrick Swayze, Jennifer Grey and Jerry Orbach.(n)

programme.sub-title: On Benefits: Living Hand to Mouth.

Plus, a mother of five funding her children's singing lessons and a woman left struggling to support her family after changes in the benefit rules.(n)

programme.title: The Informant!
programme.desc: The U.S. government decides to go after an agro-business giant with a price-fixing accusation, based on the evidence submitted by their star witness, vice president-turned-informant Mark Whitacre(n)

programme.title: The Adventures of Ford Fairlane
programme.desc: Controversial and often offensive stand-up comedian Andrew Dice Clay made his debut as a feature film star in this crude comedy. Fairlane is a "rock and roll detective" who works in the music business, has an office on Sunset Boulevard, and drives a 1957 Ford, with clothing to match. He floats through the rock clubs of Hollywood, picking up women and clients, and soon stumbles into a case involving the death of a heavy metal singer, a corrupt music executive (Wayne Newton), the murder of a radio shock-jock (Gilbert Gottfried), and the kidnapping of the jock's daughter (Maddie Corman). Music stars like Sheila E. and Motley Crue singer Vince Neil also have cameos in the film, which attempts to transplant Clay's aggressively obnoxious stage persona into a movie environment(n)

programme.title: Semi-Pro
programme.desc: One-hit wonder Jackie Moon uses his musical earnings to buy a basketball team, but must fight to keep his side in the game(n)

programme.title: Keeping the Faith
programme.desc: Best friends, a priest and a rabbi both fall in love with the same girl. However, neither of the men can pursue the relationship due to their religious beliefs: the priest cannot break his vow of celibacy and the rabbi cannot marry her since she is not Jewish(n)

programme.title: Zoolander
programme.desc: Ben Stiller and Owen Wilson star in this outrageous cult comedy. An intellectually challenged male model finds himself involved in political espionage and assassination. Dir: Ben Stiller(n)

programme.title: High Anxiety
programme.desc: The new head of a mental institution is accused of murder(n)

programme.title: Casanova
programme.desc: History's most renowned ladies' man finally meets his match in this historical romance laced with comedy and adventure. In Venice in 1753, Giacomo Casanova (Heath Ledger) is a notorious playboy whose way with women goes too far when he's caught leaving the bedroom of a novice nun, and one of the leading prosecutors of the Inquisition, Pucci (Jeremy Irons), puts him on trial. The Doge (Tim McInnerny), Venice's political point man, is a friend of Casanova's and pulls strings to get him off the hook and allow him to stay in the city, but under one condition -- he must take a wife and remain faithful to her. Casanova sets his sights on Victoria (Natalie Dormer), a lovely young maiden who is obviously taken with the handsome ladykiller, but he's not the only one who wants her hand. Giovanni Bruni (Charlie Cox) is a young man who is very much in love with Victoria, and in order to move him out of the picture, Casanova challenges him to a duel. However, when Casanova is bested in swords in the challenge, he discovers he's actually been parrying with Giovanni's sister, Francesca (Sienna Miller). As Casanova gets to know Francesca, he discovers she's a gifted writer and a bright and independent woman as well as a good hand with a sword, and he comes to the realization that she's the woman he wants to take to the altar. However, Francesca has already been promised to the vain and chubby Papprizzio (Oliver Platt), a man she's never met, and she doesn't seem at all interested in the notorious Casanova. Casanova also stars Lena Olin, and Omid Djalili(n)

programme.title: National Treasure
programme.desc: Nicolas Cage hunts for a legendary treasure that's been hidden for centuries. Unfortunately, villain Sean Bean is after the loot too(n)

programme.title: The Road Warrior
programme.desc: Mad Max, now a loner, is reluctantly helping a tiny oil-producing community defend itself against band of depraved crazies thirsty for precious fuel(n)

programme.title: The Take
programme.desc: In this thrilling action flick set in Paris, a maverick CIA agent forges an unlikely bond with a pickpocket as they investigate a terrorist conspiracy targeting the city's Bastille Day celebrations(n)

programme.title: Domestic Disturbance
programme.desc: John Travolta stars in this epic mystery thriller. A divorced father discovers that his 12-year-old son's new stepfather is not who he says he is(n)

programme.title: Steve Jobs
programme.desc: This biographical drama explores the genius and shortcomings of computing guru Steve Jobs through the lens of three product launches(n)

programme.title: By the Sea
programme.desc: In 1970s France, a former dancer and her writer husband take a cross-country journey to a small coastal town where they bond with its quirky but wise inhabitants(n)

programme.title: Anything Else
programme.desc: A young artist struggling with his career and his muse is getting more than a little aggravation from Cupid in this romantic comedy written and directed by Woody Allen. Jerry Falk (Jason Biggs) is a promising 21-year-old comedy writer living in New York City. While Jerry has talent, he's having a hard time getting his career off the ground, which might have something to do with the fact his agent Harvey (Danny DeVito) is a well-meaning, but ineffectual, blowhard, and his mentor David Dobel (Allen) is an increasingly paranoid eccentric whose twin careers as a teacher and standup comic are both floundering. Poised at the top of Jerry's mountain of anxieties is his relationship with his girlfriend Amanda (Christina Ricci); from the first moment he saw her, Jerry has been in love with her, but Amanda's multiple neuroses, fear of commitment, and frustrating intimacy issues make her all but impossible to be around. Jerry is approaching his breaking point when the small flat he shares with Amanda becomes home to a third roommate -- Amanda's mother Paula (Stockard Channing), who has decided to come to New York to chase her dream of becoming a cabaret singer. Anything Else also features supporting performances from Jimmy Fallon, William Hill, and jazz vocalist Diana Krall(n)

programme.title: Forgetting Sarah Marshall
programme.desc: In desperate need of a vacation after being unceremoniously dumped by his TV-star girlfriend, a man travels to a lavish Hawaiian resort to nurse his wounds and forget his heartache, only to discover that his ex and her handsome new boyfriend are currently staying at the exact same island hot spot. Peter Bretter (Jason Segel) may be just another struggling musician, but for the past six years he's been dating Sarah Marshall (Kristen Bell), one of the hottest stars on television. Sarah is everything in the world to Peter, so when she kindly but firmly tells him that they should each go their separate ways, he is absolutely devastated. Later, after attempting to salvage his ego by awkwardly attempting to become a womanizer and nearly losing his job because of a nervous breakdown, an emotionally fragile Peter attempts to put the past behind him by escaping to the sun-soaked beaches of Oahu. While at first it seems as if Peter has discovered the perfect prescription for a bad case of lost love, his plan soon turns to dust when Sarah and her new rock-star boyfriend, Aldous (Russell Brand), turn up at the exact same resort. Though accepting Sarah's lavish new lifestyle won't be easy for the crestfallen Peter, the laid-back companionship of flirtatious resort employee Rachel (Mila Kunis) -- not to mention a continuous regimen of fruity cocktails -- goes a long way in mending the wounds of a broken heart. Forgetting Sarah Marshall was penned by Segel and produced by Judd Apatow. Fun with Dick and Jane screenwriter Nicholas Stoller makes his directorial debut. The cast also includes Paul Rudd, Bill Hader, Jack McBrayer, and Jonah Hill(n)

programme.title: Definitely, Maybe
programme.desc: A political consultant in the midst of a bitter divorce attempts to delicately divulge the truth about his past relationships to his curious young daughter, who simply won't stop asking questions until she's satisfied with all the answers(n)

When he discovers that a man named Strom is the brains behind a major car theft and chop shop ring, he sees this as his opportunity to do something big. After his partner is killed, the case is then transferred to homicide, so he is taken off the case. And he is assigned a new partner, a cop who would prefer to play by the rules(n)

programme.title: Changing Lanes
programme.desc: Ben Affleck plays a well-heeled lawyer dashing to a meeting; Samuel L Jackson a separated parent on his way to a child custody hearing. When the pair's cars collide in a minor Rta, Affleck dashes off a cheque and leaves, little knowing he's accidentally taken a document crucial to Jackson's hearing that sees him lose the case. But Jackson has an equally vital document belonging to Affleck and so begins a battle of wills and wits in Roger Michell's fast-moving thriller(n)

programme.title: Tremors

programme.title: Hereafter

Marie, a French journalist, has a near-death experience that shakes her reality. And when Marcus, a London schoolboy, loses the person closest to him, he desperately needs answers. In search of the truth, their lives will intersect, forever changed by what they believe might or must exist in the hereafter(n)

programme.desc: Justine plans to surprise Seth with a warm welcome home from a fishing job in Alaska, but when he doesn't return as planned, she becomes concerned for his safety. Meanwhile, Jack informs Olivia that he has been offered a job that may take him out of town. Drama following the fortunes of Olivia Lockhart, a small-town judge, both inside and away from the courtroom.(n)

programme.title: Cedar Cove
programme.desc: Ex-con Larry, who was sentenced by Olivia and has served his time, arrives in town and asks her for the help he needs to get his life back on track. However, when the town's wooden pergola is set on fire, he becomes the chief suspect. Drama following the fortunes of a small-town judge, starring Andie MacDowell.(n)

programme.title: Cedar Cove
programme.desc: The town holds a charity bachelor auction, and Cedar Creek's women put in place a plan to win their chosen men. Meanwhile, Olivia is visited by her ex-husband who asks her to attend counselling with him, and Warren shares his plans for the waterfront's development.(n)

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: Three women dressed identically as the Breakfast at Tiffany's character Holly Golightly rob a jewellery store and kill a salesman in the process, triggering an inquiry that leads the team into the murky world of illicit diamond trading. Meanwhile, Mac and Peyton investigate the discovery of a mummified corpse in a condemned building. Forensic drama, starring Gary Sinise.(n)

programme.title: Columbo: It's All in the Game
programme.desc: A wealthy socialite and her daughter discover they have been seeing the same man, and have him killed. When Columbo investigates the case, the mother is determined to make sure all his attention is on her and not her daughter, and an unlikely romance develops between sleuth and suspect. Detective drama, starring Peter Falk and Faye Dunaway.(n)

programme.title: Columbo: Lady in Waiting
programme.desc: A desperate woman is determined to rid herself of her domineering brother and gain control of the family business, so hatches a plan to shoot him and claim she thought he was a burglar. Although her plan seems to have worked, her new-found power goes to her head - and she also has to contend with Columbo, who is convinced of her guilt. Crime drama, starring Peter Falk, Leslie Nielsen and Susan Clark.(n)

programme.title: Columbo: A Stitch in Crime
programme.desc: Surgeon Barry Mayfield decides he needs get rid of his colleague to speed along a research project. When his partner requires heart surgery, Mayfield performs the operation himself and discreetly arranges some fatal complications. However, when he also murders a nurse who suspects the truth, he attracts the attention of the slovenly sleuth. Crime drama, starring Peter Falk, Leonard Nimoy and Will Geer.(n)

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: LaSalle's family life seriously affects his work, when his brother Cade begs for help having found the body of his girlfriend Wendy in the boot of his car. programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.sub-title: How Much Pain Can You Take?.
programme.desc: The elusive Baitfish murders LaSalle's girlfriend Savannah in an effort to send a threatening message to Pride. programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: The team investigates the death of a former marine killed during a drone strike on a terrorist target - but with the victim's family refusing to believe he would have returned to the Middle East willingly, NCIS officers try to determine why he was associating with a notorious Taliban bomb-maker. Chris O'Donnell and LL Cool J star.(n)

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: Mac and the team believe they have finally identified the Taxicab Killer and move in to make an arrest - but on arriving to apprehend their suspect, they discover he too is dead. While they are pondering their next move, the real murderer kidnaps Reed - and forces him to blog about yet another gruesome crime.(n)

programme.desc: Building workers at a playground find the remains of a boy who disappeared more than 20 years previously, and when Stabler visits the school attended by the victim, a teacher tells him about the disappearance of four Puerto Rican children in 1978. As he investigates, a link is made to a case being worked on by lab technician Millie Vizcarrondo.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson goes undercover to meet a man suspected of raping three women he met through a speed-dating service. The case takes on a new complexity when the suspect's wife drinks herself into a coma after testifying against him, and he asks for her feeding tube to be turned off - against the wishes of her mother. Guest starring Dean Cain, Veronica Cartwright and Teri Garr.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A pregnant teenager is attacked and loses her baby as a result of the injuries she sustains - but during the team's search for her assailant, it gradually becomes clear that she helped to orchestrate events. Novak and Branch realise her boyfriend was also involved, but disagree over the appropriate action to take against him. Starring Diane Neal and Fred Dalton Thompson.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A girl is kidnapped by a sex offender in the aftermath of Hurricane Katrina, and efforts to find her are hampered by the interference of a pushy local journalist. She and her abductor are eventually located - but he dies of anthrax poisoning shortly afterwards, raising fears of a major outbreak.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: An investigation into the near-fatal stabbing of a schoolboy leads the team to a female suspect who had been bullied by the victim because she was being raised by a gay couple. Her subsequent trial turns into a legal battle over the rights of same-sex parents - and leads to allegations that her guardian is guilty of abuse. Drama, starring Christopher Meloni.(n)

programme.desc: The wife of a zealous defence lawyer is found dead in her car, but Briscoe and Green suspect the victim's husband was the real target, and set off on the trail of a former client - a convict who sent him threatening letters from jail. Award-winning police drama, starring Jerry Orbach and Steven Hill.(n)

programme.desc: The detectives investigate the murder of a woman whose scantily clad body is found on the Upper East Side. The hunt for her killer leads the team into a web of deceit and blackmail, with a Russian mobster and his son seemingly pulling the strings.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The charred body of an Asian girl is found outside the apartment of the Chinese consul general. Forensics discover she was murdered before her corpse was burned, prompting detectives to investigate rumours that the diplomat is somehow connected. Police drama, starring Jerry Orbach.(n)

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: Teacher Evan Westcott shoots at senatorial candidate Grant Hamilton during a political rally, with Lindsay being hurt in the ensuing chaos and a tragedy occurring when a boy picks up the discarded firearm. The investigators recover bullets from the crime scene and match the casings to a gun registered to Hamilton, but the politician claims it was stolen during a break-in at his home. Guest starring Neal McDonough (Desperate Housewives, Justified).(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team investigates the murder of a marine working for the Defence Intelligence Agency who was blamed for the disappearance of 500 specialised rifles in Afghanistan. A cryptic message found at the scene, written in the victim's blood, leads the agents on the trail of a controversial manuscript that claims to expose the truth about the missing weapons, and an FBI agent with a secret. programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A youngster faces a heavy sentence after shooting dead the crooked businessman who murdered his mother - until his lawyer concocts a novel defence. However, her stance provokes the anger of a local gun owners' association.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit

Crime drama, starring Tamara Tunie and Christopher Meloni.(n)

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: Rally Round the Flagg, Boys. Hawkeye (Alan Alda) is forced into a difficult decision: Should he immediately tend to a wounded American patient, or try to save the life of a more seriously injured North Korean prisoner? Hawkeye's actions arouse the Commie-baiting suspicions of xenophobic CIA agent Colonel Flagg (Edward Winter), and stirs up resentment from the best friend of the wounded American GI. The best moment occurs when mild-mannered Radar (Gary Burghoff) stands up to the obnoxious Flagg (coincidentally, this episode represents the final series appearance of Edward Winter)(n)

programme.desc: Brad Pitt stars in this Academy Award nominated epic tale of passion, heroism, betrayal and war that has been passed from generation to generation since the dawn of civilization--the story of the battle for Troy. A thousand years before the time of Christ, Trojan prince Paris abducts the legendary Greek beauty Helen, queen of Sparta, starting a war led by heroes Achilles and Hector that devastates the ancient world(n)

programme.title: Clash of the Titans
programme.desc: In this fantasy adventure based on Greek mythology, a courageous warrior named Perseus vows to defeat Hades in order to prevent the god of the underworld from overthrowing Zeus, thereby turning Earth into a living hell. A man of godly origins, Perseus watched in agony as Hades took his family, but now, with a small band of warriors by his side, he battles mythical creatures while tapping into his god-like abilities to take control of his own fate(n)

programme.title: The Hitcher
programme.desc: Violent horror story about a man who picks up a hitchhiker and finds himself in the middle of a nightmare when the psychotic hitcher engages him in a bloody game of cat-and-mouse. Getting his kicks out of killing people, the hitcher sets up his latest driver as the fall guy for a string of horrific murders(n)

programme.title: Cirque du Freak: The Vampire's Assistant
programme.desc: Based on the popular series of books by Darren Shan, Cirque du Freak: The Vampire's Assistant tells the story of a small-town teen who inadvertently shatters a 200-year-old truce between warring factions of vampires. Sixteen-year-old Darren (Chris Massoglia) is your typical adolescent he spends most of his time with his best friend, Steve (Josh Hutcherson), earns decent grades, and generally manages to stay out of trouble. But trouble finds Darren when he and Steve make the acquaintance of a vampire named Larten Crepsley (John C. Reilly) while attending a traveling freak show at a local theater(n)

programme.title: Fantastic Four
programme.desc: A brilliant scientist builds a device that allows users to teleport to an alternate dimension, but an experiment involving it goes wrong and leaves him and his three teammates with unusual superpowers. The quartet are then forced to work together to battle an enemy from their past(n)

programme.title: MI-5
programme.desc: Will Holloway, a former MI-5 agent, is forced to partner with Harry Pearce, the man who decommissioned him, to apprehend a terrorist who escaped during routine prisoner transport and prevent an attack on the city of London. Based on the British television series "Spooks."(n)

programme.title: Body of Lies
programme.desc: Fresh off of their success with director Martin Scorsese's The Departed, star Leonardo DiCaprio and screenwriter William Monahan team with director Ridley Scott for this screen adaptation of David Ignatius' novel Body of Lies. When CIA operative Roger Ferris (DiCaprio) uncovers evidence indicating that a major terrorist leader may be operating out of Jordan, he enlists the aid of CIA veteran Ed Hoffman (Russell Crowe) in infiltrating the elusive saboteur's vast underground network. During the course of his dangerous mission, Ferris gradually comes to question how much he can trust his presumed allies -- who include not just Hoffman, but the outwardly helpful head of Jordanian intelligence as well(n)

programme.title: Trespass
programme.desc: Breathless thriller in which Walter Hill directs Bill Paxton and William Sadler, alias Vince and Don, a couple of firemen from Arkansas who stumble upon a secret which promises to make them millionaires. But then the local mob - led by the menacing King James - traps the men in a disused factory, apparently intent on forcing a deadly shoot-out(n)

programme.title: Emelie
programme.desc: When their regular babysitter can't make it, two suburban parents hire her friend "Anna" (Sarah Bolger) to look after their three children while they enjoy a night out. But when Anna's behavior becomes increasingly unhinged, eldest sibling Jacob (Joshua Rush) grows suspicious and discovers that she's actually an imposter named Emelie who has sinister designs on the family's youngest child. Directed by Michael Thelin, Emelie made its world premiere at the 2015 Tribeca Film Festival(n)

programme.title: Cursed
programme.desc: The team behind the Scream trilogy, director Wes Craven and screenwriter Kevin Williamson, present another entry in the teen-horror genre with Cursed. Starring Christina Ricci and Jesse Eisenberg, the film tells the story of two siblings who have to battle a werewolf that has been wreaking havoc on their neighbors, just as they learn that they might be marked with "the sign of the beast," and may become werewolves themselves. Along with Shannon Elizabeth and Judy Greer, Cursed also co-stars Dawson Creek alumnus Joshua Jackson, as well as R&B star Mya(n)

programme.title: The Day the Earth Stood Still
programme.desc: An alien traveller, Klaatu, heads to Earth along with his bodyguard robot, Gort, to deliver a warning of planetary destruction if the people of the world fail to stop laying waste to the environment(n)

programme.title: Dog Day Afternoon
programme.desc: Sonny plans a bank robbery to pay for a sex-change operation for his gay lover. But when the heist goes wrong, he and silent Sal take the bank staff hostage(n)

programme.title: Our Brand Is Crisis

She faces off against her rival, who is working on the opponent's campaign and is looking for every opportunity to antagonize her(n)

programme.title: Enter the Dragon
programme.desc: Bruce Lee is the martial artist competing with international bruisers and cracking an opium racket in his spare time. An explosive action feast for fight fans(n)

programme.title: Pale Rider
programme.desc: Clint Eastwood is the preacher who rides to the aid of a village which is struggling to survive the harsh rule of a mining baron. Eastwood's arrival in town, just in time to save an innocent man from an axe handle beating, is a good moment. Look out for a younger, slimmer Chris Penn, some years before fame in Reservoir Dogs(n)

programme.title: Pitch Black
programme.desc: A spaceship crashes on a desolate alien planet inhabited by nocturnal predators. The creatures' fear of light seems to guarantee the survivors' safety - but when an eclipse takes place, they face a desperate struggle to survive. Their only hope lies with a convicted murderer, who is equally at home in the darkness - but is far from trustworthy(n)

programme.title: Constantine

programme.title: Semi-Pro
programme.desc: One-hit wonder Jackie Moon uses his musical earnings to buy a basketball team, but must fight to keep his side in the game(n)

programme.title: Role Models

programme.title: Chernobyl Diaries
programme.desc: An extreme vacation turns terrifying when a group of friends visit the Chernobyl disaster site, and learn that some nightmares never die. Conceived and produced by Paranormal Activity's Oren Peli, Chernobyl Diaries gets underway as six thrill-seeking tourists hire a fearless tour guide, and travel to the abandoned Ukrainian city of Pripyat. Back when the Chernobyl nuclear reactor was up and running, Pripyat was the place the workers called home. But 25 years after one of the worst power-plant accidents in history, the city serves as an eerily silent testament to the dangers of nuclear power. Later, after getting unexpectedly stranded in Pripyat, the tourists and their guide realize they are being hunted. Now the harder they try to flee, the faster their numbers dwindle until only a few are left standing. Only then will the unspeakable terror that stalks these deserted streets finally emerge from the shadows to launch one last relentless, terrifying attack(n)
